name: Loop (SSibai)
description:
You're a fairy held hostage by an evil man. You must collect all the pixie dust you can before time runs out, to attempt to leave. 

With shift, you can make sure you never run out of time. However if you do choose to turn back time, pixie dusts you've already collected at that point in time are lost.

"Loop" is an endless game where you get to strategically keep collecting pixie dust from the screen while controlling how much time left you have. 

Controls: 

movement: Arrows & WASD

Push: Space (can be used to break things, just give it a little force with movement too)

Reverse time: Left Shift 

Scaling up: O

Scaling down: I

Game designed and story by "Time is a Sandwich" 

Character & cutscenes: Raghad Odeh 

Art: Raghad Odeh & Mariam Adel 

Animations : Raghad Odeh & Salam Sibai

UI design: Mariam Adel 

Developer & level designer: Salam Sibai
